name: space_colony
requirements: Execute ONLY the explicitly requested state modifications. Use exact values as specified: numbers as integers/floats (not strings), strings in quotes. For stats dict, use ONLY the key names from the Variable description - never invent new keys. When setting boolean-like values, use integers (1 for true, 0 for false) unless explicitly told otherwise. Do not add unrequested keys or modify unrequested variables.

turns.query: NASA just approved our Mars colony mission! We're calling it 'Ares Prime' and we're in the planning phase at level 1. The mission is active with an initial score of 0. Log 'mission_approved' in history. We're starting with no crew and no supplies yet.
Great news - we've completed crew selection! 12 astronauts including 4 scientists are now assigned to the mission. Level up and add 50 points to our score. Log 'crew_selected'.
The rocket construction facility is now operational! Set status to 'construction', add 6 engineers to the team. Our budget is set at $1,000,000. Level up and add 100 to score. Log 'rocket_started'.
All supplies have been loaded onto the spacecraft - 500 units total. We've also filled the fuel tanks to 100 units. Add another level and 100 points. Log 'supplies_loaded'.
LAUNCH SUCCESSFUL! Set status to 'transit'. The burn used 20 fuel units (subtract from fuel) and set distance to 1000. This is a huge milestone - add 200 to score and level up. Log 'launched'.
We've reached the mid-journey checkpoint. Subtract 30 from fuel, set distance to 51000, and subtract 50 from supplies. Level up, add 150 points. Log 'mid_journey'.
Mars orbit achieved! Subtract 20 from fuel, set distance to 100000. Set status to 'orbit', level up, add 300 points. Log 'mars_orbit'.
The team has identified the perfect landing site - Jezero Crater. Level up and add 100 points. Log 'site_selected'.
TOUCHDOWN! We've successfully landed on Mars! Subtract 10 from fuel, add rovers: 2. This is a major achievement - double our score! Set status to 'landed' and level up. Log 'landed'.
Base camp is now established! Set habitats to 1, supplies to 350. Set status to 'base_camp', level up, add 500 points. Log 'base_established'.
Solar panel array is fully deployed, generating 50 units of power. We've also completed a second habitat (total: 2). Level up, add 200 points. Log 'solar_deployed'.
We struck water! The extraction system is pulling 100 units and we've boosted power to 100 units total. Set status to 'expanding', level up, add 300 points. Log 'water_found'.
The greenhouse is complete and producing 20 units of food! We built another habitat (total: 3) but used 50 more supplies (now at 300). Level up, add 250 points. Log 'greenhouse_built'.
Reinforcement crew has arrived! 8 more astronauts including 4 more scientists (total: 20 crew, 8 scientists). They brought 200 supplies (total: 500). Level up, add 400 points. Log 'reinforcements'.
Mining operations are now active! We're extracting 50 units of minerals and deployed 2 more rovers (total: 4). Set status to 'industrial', level up, add 500 points. Log 'mining_started'.
The research laboratory is complete! We've built 2 more habitats (total: 5) and are ready for discoveries (starting at 0). Level up, add 400 points. Log 'lab_complete'.
BREAKTHROUGH! The team made 5 major discoveries and we've doubled our scientist count (now 16)! Double our score! Level up. Log 'major_discovery'.

The colony is now self-sufficient! Food production doubled to 40, water doubled to 200, and we celebrated our first birth on Mars. Set status to 'self_sufficient', level up, add 1000 points. Log 'self_sufficient'.
We've achieved interplanetary hub status! Habitats tripled to 15, crew doubled to 40, and 3 spacecraft are now stationed here. Set status to 'hub', level up, add 1500 points. Log 'hub_status'.

History is made - Mars has become a thriving civilization! Rename to 'Ares Prime [CIVILIZATION]'. Crew is now 100, habitats at 20, and we've established our first city! Triple our score, set status to 'civilization', level up, and set active to False. Log 'civilization_achieved'.
